pitch.real_estate: Real estate grows with leads. Cloudora helps you get genuine buyer and seller enquiries, strong online visibility, and telecallers or CRM to support your follow-ups.
pitch.restaurants: Cloudora helps restaurants increase walk-ins and online orders through marketing, Google ranking, and promotions, and we even support manpower like chefs and waiters.
pitch.local_services: We bring you daily clients and local leads through targeted local ads, Google business listing, and WhatsApp outreach.
pitch.retail: Cloudora helps retail shops with local visibility, store promotions, and online catalogs to increase footfall and sales.
pitch.startups: Cloudora becomes your full growth partner—branding, marketing, website, manpower, client acquisition, and training—everything to grow your idea.
pitch.education: We help institutions get more admission enquiries through targeted campaigns, landing pages, and CRM follow-ups.
pitch.ecommerce: We boost online orders with performance ads, product creatives, catalog optimization and automated remarketing.
pitch.health: Cloudora brings more appointments and memberships through local promotion, SEO and appointment automation.
pitch.automobile: We generate buyer enquiries and test-drive bookings with local ads and CRM follow-up.
pitch.travel: We improve your booking enquiries through targeted campaigns, landing pages, and automation.
pitch.beauty: We bring more bookings and increase your online reputation through local ads and promotions.
pitch.finance: We drive qualified leads for insurance, loans and advisors with targeted marketing and CRM funnels.
pitch.manufacturing: We promote B2B buyer leads and distributor enquiries with product catalogs and targeted outreach.
pitch.freelancer: We help freelancers find high-value clients through portfolio websites and targeted campaigns.
pitch.logistics: We bring more bookings and local visibility through Google Maps optimization and lead campaigns.
pitch.homeservices: Hyperlocal campaigns for plumbers, electricians, and technicians to increase daily service calls.
